original_text: When it was nearly evening, the 12 apostles came to Jesus. ‘There are no houses in this place,’ they said. ‘Send the crowd away now. Tell them to go to the villages and farms near here. Then they can get food to eat and they can find a place to sleep.’
korean_text: 날이 저물어 가매 열두 사도가 나아와 여짜오되 무리를 보내어 두루 마을과 촌으로 가서 유하며 먹을 것을 얻게 하소서 우리가 있는 여기는 빈 들이니이다

sentences.original_text: There are no houses in this place
Tell them to go to the villages
Then they can get food to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들은 먹을 음식을 얻을 수 있고

sentences.original_text: and they can find a place to sleep
sentences.korean_translation: 잠 잘 곳을 찾을 수 있습니다
